param.name: name
param.span: 字符串值，其中包含要添加的查询字符串选项的名称。

span.span: The string value that contains the name of the query string option to add.

param.name: value
param.span: 对象，其中包含查询字符串选项的值。

span.span: The object that contains the value of the query string option.

summary.span: 创建新的 ，并在由返回的查询生成的 URI 中设置查询选项。

span.span: Creates a new with the query option set in the URI generated by the returned query.

returns.span: 一种新查询，可将所请求的查询选项追加到所提供查询的 URI

span.span: A new query that includes the requested query option appended to the URI of the supplied query

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查询选项添加到生成的 URI 使用`?name=value&name2=value2`...The query options are added to the resultant URI using `?name=value&name2=value2`… 语法，其中名称直接映射到`name`参数和`value`通过上调用 ToString 获得`value`参数。syntax where the name maps directly to the `name` parameter and the `value` is obtained by calling ToString on the `value` parameter. `name` 以 `$` 开头。The `name` starts with `$`. 非 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]语法不以 `$` 开头。Non-[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] syntax does not start with `$`. 非 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]查询选项可以使用此方法进行添加。Non-[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] query options can be added using this method. 如果选项不是 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]查询选项，则两次添加同一查询选项是合法的。It is legal to add the same query option twice if the option is not an [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] query option. 如果添加基础 URI 中已存在的查询选项，则将引发异常。If a query option is added that is already present in the underlying URI, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示与顺序 方法调用一起使用的 ，用于仅返回运费成本超过 30 美元的订单，并根据发货日期按降序顺序对这些结果进行排序。The following example shows a that is used with sequential method calls to only return orders with a freight cost of more than $30 and to order the results by the ship date in descending order. [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#AddQueryOptions](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/cs/source.cs#addqueryoptions)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#AddQueryOptions](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/source.vb#addqueryoptions)] 下面的示例演示如何撰写等效于上述查询（使用了 ）的 LINQ 查询。The following example shows how to compose a LINQ query that is equivalent to the previous query that used . [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#AddQueryOptionsLinq](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/cs/source.cs#addqueryoptionslinq)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#AddQueryOptionsLinq](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/source.vb#addqueryoptionslinq)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法相当于包括`$inlinecount`查询查询 URI 中的选项。Calling the method is equivalent to including the `$inlinecount` query option in the query URI. ## Examples 此示例在调用 方法之后执行查询。This example executes a query after it calls the method. 属性用于确定查询返回的实体数量。The property is used to determine number of entities returned by the query.
